definition: to cheat/to swindle/to pretend/to feign/to draw sb out/to try to extract information by deceit or bluff
to take unfair advantage of/to deceive/to cheat

sentences.english: For her dual citizenship, the court found Stella Lee guilty of fraud and not corruption.
sentences.chinese: 立委李慶安雙重國籍案，法院以詐欺罪判二年。

sentences.english: Eisler was finally indicted for passport fraud.
sentences.chinese: 艾斯勒最後由於護照詐欺行爲被起訴。

sentences.english: The judge convicted the businessman of fraud.
sentences.chinese: 法官判定那個生意人詐欺。

sentences.english: Example : Us state laws to protect investor against fraudulent trader in securities.
sentences.chinese: 維護投資者使其免上詐欺性證券買賣商當的州法。

sentences.english: Eisler was finally indicted for passport fraud .
sentences.chinese: 艾斯勒最後由於護照詐欺行爲被起訴。

definition: to search for and seize (criminals, smuggled goods etc)
to suppress/to crack down on/to prohibit
variant of 聯絡|联络[lian2 luo4]
